Installation¶

Requirements¶

  • Python 3.8 or higher

  • pip (Python package installer)

Installation Steps¶

  1. Clone the repository: .. code-block:: bash

    git clone https://github.com/yourusername/ordinal_xai.git cd ordinal_xai

  2. Create and activate a virtual environment: .. code-block:: bash

    python -m venv venv source venv/bin/activate # On Windows: .venvScriptsactivate

  3. Install the package and its dependencies: .. code-block:: bash

    pip install -r requirements.txt

Dependencies¶

The package requires the following Python packages:

  • numpy

  • pandas

  • scikit-learn

  • matplotlib
